remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 因为继承中的中间类可能实现此方法, 所以建议您在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的用途类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] \*方法的事件模式: 此方法提供了通过建立类处理程序而不是实例处理程序来处理来自派生类的匹配事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下, 匹配事件是路由事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 对于路由事件, On\*方法的实现模式是不同的, 因为路由事件可以由子元素引发, 这不一定是将调用处理程序的元素。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此, 您的实现需要检查事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 大多数情况下, 它不应尝试 reraise 该事件。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或使用注册类处理程序, 可以在事件路由中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 适用于类处理的一种情况是操作事件数据, 并将路由事件标记为 "已处理"。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 专门用于预览事件的另一种方案是将其标记为已处理, 以便不会调用匹配的冒泡类处理程序。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void OnPreviewQueryContinueDrag (System.Windows.QueryContinueDragEventArgs e);

abstract member OnPreviewQueryContinueDrag : System.Windows.QueryContinueDragEventArgs -> unit override this.OnPreviewQueryContinueDrag : System.Windows.QueryContinueDragEventArgs -> unit

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 因为继承中的中间类可能实现此方法, 所以建议您在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的用途类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] \*方法的事件模式: 此方法提供了通过建立类处理程序而不是实例处理程序来处理来自派生类的匹配事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下, 匹配事件是路由事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 对于路由事件, On\*方法的实现模式是不同的, 因为路由事件可以由子元素引发, 这不一定是将调用处理程序的元素。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此, 您的实现需要检查事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 大多数情况下, 它不应尝试 reraise 该事件。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或使用注册类处理程序, 可以在事件路由中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 适用于类处理的一种情况是操作事件数据, 并将路由事件标记为 "已处理"。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 专门用于预览事件的另一种方案是将其标记为已处理, 以便不会调用匹配的冒泡类处理程序。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 因为继承中的中间类可能实现此方法, 所以建议您在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的用途类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] \*方法的事件模式: 此方法提供了通过建立类处理程序而不是实例处理程序来处理来自派生类的匹配事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下, 匹配事件是路由事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 对于路由事件, On\*方法的实现模式是不同的, 因为路由事件可以由子元素引发, 这不一定是将调用处理程序的元素。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此, 您的实现需要检查事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 大多数情况下, 它不应尝试 reraise 该事件。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或使用注册类处理程序, 可以在事件路由中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 适用于类处理的一种情况是操作事件数据, 并将路由事件标记为 "已处理"。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void OnStylusEnter (System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs e);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnStylusEnter(class System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub OnStylusEnter (e As StylusEventArgs)
abstract member OnStylusEnter : System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs -> unit override this.OnStylusEnter : System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs -> unit

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 因为继承中的中间类可能实现此方法, 所以建议您在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 您可以根据自己的要求, 在特殊处理之前或之后调用 base。You may call base either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements. 此方法的用途类似[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]于\*方法的事件模式: 此方法提供了通过建立类处理程序而不是实例处理程序来处理派生类中的匹配事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下, 匹配事件是路由事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 将事件标记为已处理仍然有助于防止调用典型的实例处理程序 (未指定`handledEventsToo`的实例处理程序)。Marking the event as handled is still useful for preventing typical instance handlers (those that do not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked.

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 为在此元素内按下触摸屏输入时发生的 路由事件提供类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event that occurs when a touch presses inside this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件将为此类创建附加事件的别名, 因此当继承为基元素时 , 它是类成员列表的一部分。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加到事件的事件处理程序附加到基础附加事件, 并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|建立Tunneling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的冒泡事件为。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

Public Shared ReadOnly PreviewDragEnterEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: 在此元素聚焦于键盘时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the keyboard is focused on this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于此事件使用隧道路由, 因此具有焦点的元素可以是子元素, 而不是实际附加事件处理程序的元素。Because this event uses tunneling routing, the element that has focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 检查事件数据中的, 以确定具有焦点的实际元素。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that has focus. 此事件将为此类创建附加事件的别名, 因此当继承为基元素时 , 它是类成员列表的一部分。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加到事件的事件处理程序附加到基础附加事件, 并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|建立Tunneling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的冒泡事件为。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 在此元素聚焦于键盘并且按下某个键时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a key is pressed while the keyboard is focused on this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 键处理与其他平台功能 (如命令和文本撰写) 交互。Key handling interacts with other platform features such as commanding and text composition. 事件是较低级别的文本输入事件, 可能不会在某些控件上按预期方式工作。The event is a lower-level text input event that might not behave as expected on certain controls. 这是因为某些控件具有控件组合或类处理, 可提供较高级别的文本输入处理和相关事件。This is because some controls have control compositing or class handling that provides a higher-level version of text input handling and related events. 此事件将为此类创建附加事件的别名, 因此当继承为基元素时 , 它是类成员列表的一部分。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加到事件的事件处理程序附加到基础附加事件, 并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|建立Tunneling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的冒泡事件为。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 有关注册路由的事件的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PreviewMouseDown As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: 在指针位于此元素上并且按下任意鼠标按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when any mouse button is pressed while the pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件将为此类创建附加事件的别名, 因此当继承为基元素时 , 它是类成员列表的一部分。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加到事件的事件处理程序附加到基础附加事件, 并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 事件通常与或一起引发, 这对应于按下这两个标准鼠标按钮之一。 The event is often raised together with either or , which correspond to a press of one of the two standard mouse buttons. 和也是路由事件, 但它们是直接路由事件, 当事件沿事件路由到达此元素时, 将引发相应的按钮特定的事件。 and are also routed events, but they are direct routed events, and the appropriate button-specific event is raised when the event reaches this element along the event route. 请参阅或 的 "备注"。See Remarks for or . ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|建立Tunneling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的冒泡事件为。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.RoutedEvent PreviewMouseDownEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly PreviewMouseDownEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: 标识 路由事件。

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 有关注册路由的事件的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: 在鼠标指针位于此元素上并且按下鼠标左键时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管此[路由事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)看起来是通过元素树跟踪隧道路由, 但实际上它是一个直接路由事件, 每个事件都由元素树逐一引发和 reraised。Although this [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) seems to follow a tunneling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each . 此事件是多个相关事件之一, 用于报告基础事件的鼠标按钮细节, 该事件是由事件路由中的每个元素处理的附加事件。This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route. 此事件的参数公开基础事件的参数。The arguments of this event expose the arguments of the underlying event. 如果该事件在事件路由中标记为 "已处理", 则仍会引发鼠标按钮特定的事件;但是, 必须通过显式调用来添加鼠标按钮特定事件的处理程序, 并且可以选择处理已标记为已处理的事件, 以便作为事件的侦听器。If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling , with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event. 从概念上讲, 将此事件 (和中的其他鼠标按钮事件) 视为鼠标 "服务" (使用类提供的服务定义)。Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on ) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the class). 事件增加了不需要在事件数据中检查鼠标按钮状态 (从左到右、向下) 的原始鼠标事件的便利。The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data. 对于更高级的方案, 如检查非标准按钮的状态, 可能需要[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] 在类而不是上使用。For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the class rather than those on . ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate|| - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

Public Shared ReadOnly PreviewMouseLeftButtonDownEvent As RoutedEvent

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当鼠标指针第一次进入元素边界时, 以及当鼠标指针移动到元素边界内时, 将发生此事件。This event occurs both when the mouse pointer first enters into the element bounds, and also when the mouse pointer moves while still remaining within the element bounds. 此事件将为此类创建附加事件的别名, 因此当继承为基元素时 , 它是类成员列表的一部分。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加到事件的事件处理程序附加到基础附加事件, 并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|建立Tunneling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的冒泡事件为。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 在鼠标指针位于此元素上并且用户滚动鼠标滚轮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user rotates the mouse wheel while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 焦点或鼠标捕获优先于鼠标指针所在的位置;因此, 如果从焦点或捕获的元素接收此事件, 则鼠标指针实际上可能位于另一个元素上。Focus or mouse capture take precedence over where the mouse pointer is; therefore, if you receive this event from a focused or captured element, the mouse pointer might actually be over another element. 此事件将为此类创建附加事件的别名, 因此当继承为基元素时 , 它是类成员列表的一部分。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加到事件的事件处理程序附加到基础附加事件, 并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|建立Tunneling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的冒泡事件为。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

Public Shared ReadOnly PreviewMouseWheelEvent As RoutedEvent

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件将为此类创建附加事件的别名, 因此当继承为基元素时 , 它是类成员列表的一部分。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加到事件的事件处理程序附加到基础附加事件, 并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 触摸、鼠标和触笔输入在特定关系中存在。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|建立Tunneling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的冒泡事件为。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件允许组件或应用程序以与设备无关的方式侦听文本输入。The event allows a component or application to listen for text input in a device-independent manner. 键盘是的主要方式, 但语音、手写和其他输入设备也可能会生成。 The keyboard is the primary means of ; but speech, handwriting, and other input devices can also generate . 由于键组合 (在默认键盘或通过输入法编辑器) 中, 多个键事件可能只引发一个文本输入事件。Because of key combinations - either in default keyboards or through input method editors - multiple key events may raise just one text input event. 此事件将为此类创建附加事件的别名, 因此当继承为基元素时 , 它是类成员列表的一部分。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加到事件的事件处理程序附加到基础附加事件, 并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|建立Tunneling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的冒泡事件为。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下, 在手指触摸屏幕并移动之前, 和事件不会发生。By default, the and events do not occur until a finger touches the screen and moves. 在屏幕上按一根手指并在不移动它的情况下, 将导致的按下和保持行为。Pressing a finger on the screen and holding it without moving it causes the press and hold behavior of a . 按住行为等效于鼠标右键单击。The press and hold behavior is equivalent to a mouse right-click. 若要使和事件在手指触摸屏幕时立即发生, 请将此元素的附加属性设置`false`为。To cause the and events to occur as soon as a finger touches the screen, set the attached property to `false` for this element. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|建立Tunneling| |委托Delegate|类型。 of type .| - 对应的冒泡事件为。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event QueryCursor As QueryCursorEventHandler

summary.span: 当请求显示光标时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the cursor is requested to display.

summary.span: 每次鼠标指针移至新位置时都会在一个元素上引发此事件，这意味着光标对象可能需要根据其新位置进行更改。

span.span: This event is raised on an element each time that the mouse pointer moves to a new location, which means the cursor object might need to be changed based on its new position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件将为此类创建附加事件的别名, 因此当继承为基元素时 , 它是类成员列表的一部分。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加到事件的事件处理程序附加到基础附加事件, 并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 此事件名称所引用的游标不一定是文本光标 (有时也称为插入点)。The cursor being referred to by this event name is not necessarily the text cursor (sometimes known as the insertion point). 相反, 此上下文中的光标是一个对象, 该对象声明与 Windows 编程中几个可能的输入相关设备或概念相关的屏幕图形显示。Instead, the cursor in this context is the object that declares the onscreen graphical display related to several possible input-related devices or concepts in Windows programming. 该对象由 WPF 中的类表示。That object is represented by the class in WPF. WPF 输入系统使你可以在其表示鼠标指针的屏幕位置时更改此光标。The WPF input system enables you to change this cursor when it represents the onscreen position of the mouse pointer. 可以从枚举中使用预定义的值, 也可以将自定义游标声明为映像文件。You can use predefined values from the enumeration, or you can declare a custom cursor as an image file. 侦听事件不是游标管理的有效方法。Listening for the event is not an efficient technique for cursor management. 相反, 每个元素应通过和定义其自己的游标行为。Instead, each element should define its own cursor behavior with and . 只应依赖于是否未使用 WPF 框架级基元素, 或者在基于每个元素定义游标行为的特殊情况下, 不能满足您的需求。You should only rely on if you are not using the WPF framework-level base elements, or in extraordinary circumstances where defining cursor behavior on a per-element basis does not meet your needs. 有关实现游标行为以响应的详细信息, 请参阅。 For more information on implementing cursor behavior in response to , see . ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 未定义相应的隧道事件。There is no defined corresponding tunneling event. - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 引发特定路由事件。

summary.span: 在提供的 实例内标识将引发的 （作为该事件数据的 属性）。

span.span: The to be raised is identified within the instance that is provided (as the property of that event data).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数被类型化为所有路由事件数据的公共基类型; 但是, 应将事件数据指定为可用于引发事件的最特定事件数据类型, 因为派生类包含`e`在引发特定事件时用于特定事件的实际特定数据属性。The `e` parameter is typed as the common base type for all routed event data; however, the event data should be given as the most specific event data type that is available for the event being raised, because derived classes contain the actual specific data properties that are intended for the specific event when it is raised. 不只是事件的状态属性;它还标识要引发的路由事件。 is not just the state properties for the event; it also identifies which routed event to raise. 此事件引发模式和路由事件数据都不同于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件和数据类, 通常只包含与事件相关的属性。This event-raising pattern and the routed event data both differ from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] events and data classes, which typically just contain properties that are related to the event. ## Examples 下面的示例创建事件数据、将事件标识符追加到数据, 然后使用事件数据实例引发自定义路由事件。The following example creates event data, appends the event identifier to the data, and then uses the event data instance to raise a custom routed event. [!code-csharp[ContentElementsSmorgasbord#RaiseEvent](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentElementsSmorgasbord/CSharp/page1.xaml.cs#raiseevent)] [!code-vb[ContentElementsSmorgasbord#RaiseEvent](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentElementsSmorgasbord/visualbasic/page1.xaml.vb#raiseevent)]

abstract member RemoveHandler : System.Windows.RoutedEvent * Delegate -> unit override this.RemoveHandler : System.Windows.RoutedEvent * Delegate -> unit

param.name: routedEvent
param.span: 要附加处理程序的路由事件的标识符。

span.span: The identifier of the.routed event for which the handler is attached.

param.name: handler
param.span: 要从此元素的事件处理程序集合中删除的特定处理程序实现。

span.span: The specific handler implementation to remove from the event handler collection on this element.

summary.span: 从此元素中删除指定的路由事件处理程序。

span.span: Removes the specified routed event handler from this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)]情况最常见的情况是, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]实现与自定义路由事件相关联的 "包装" 事件, 特别是在为[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]级别实现处理程序的 "删除" 逻辑时。The most common scenario for using this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)] is when you implement the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] "wrapper" event that is associated with a custom routed event, specifically when you implement the "remove" logic for handlers at the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] level. 此备注部分后面的示例演示了这种情况。The example that follows this remarks section illustrates this scenario. 如果没有向与方法调用的输入参数匹配的条件注册处理程序, 则调用此方法将不起作用。Calling this method has no effect if there were no handlers registered with criteria that match the input parameters for the method call. 如果附加了多个与条件相匹配的处理程序, 则只会删除事件处理程序存储中的第一个处理程序。If more than one handler is attached that matched the criteria, only the first handler in the event handler store is removed. 此行为与[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] `-=`运算符的行为一致。This behavior is consistent with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] behavior of the `-=` operator. 既`routedEvent`不`handler`是也`null`不是。Neither `routedEvent` nor `handler` may be `null`. 尝试提供任何一个值时`null` , 将引发异常。Attempting to provide either value as `null` will raise an exception. 此方法将忽略`handledEventsToo`参数信息, 如果处理程序是首次通过签名添加的, 而该签名启用了已处理的事件, 则提供此方法。This method ignores the `handledEventsToo` parameter information, which is provided if the handler was first added with the signature that enables handling of already-handled events. 已删除任一类型的处理程序。Either type of handler is removed.

summary.span: 在指针位于此元素上并且按下触笔按钮时发生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件将为此类创建附加事件的别名, 因此当继承为基元素时 , 它是类成员列表的一部分。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加到事件的事件处理程序附加到基础附加事件, 并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 触摸、鼠标和触笔输入在特定关系中存在。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的隧道事件为。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 在触笔进入此元素的边界时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the stylus enters the bounds of this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是使用直接事件处理路由策略的[路由事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。 is a [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) that uses the direct event handling routing strategy. 直接路由事件不沿路由引发;相反, 它们是在引发它们的同一元素中进行处理的。Direct routed events are not raised along a route; instead, they are handled in the same element where they are raised. 但是, 它们会启用路由事件行为的其他方面, 如样式中的事件触发器。However, they do enable other aspects of routed event behavior, such as event triggers in styles. 尽管在触笔进入元素边界时进行跟踪, 但此事件更确切地报告此元素上的属性值`false`已`true`从更改为。Although tracks when the stylus enters the bounds of an element, this event more literally reports that the property value has changed from `false` to `true` on this element. 此事件将为此类创建附加事件的别名, 因此当继承为基元素时 , 它是类成员列表的一部分。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加到事件的事件处理程序附加到基础附加事件, 并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 触摸、鼠标和触笔输入在特定关系中存在。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate|| - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关触笔手势的详细信息, 请参阅。For more information about stylus gestures, see . 此事件将为此类创建附加事件的别名, 因此当继承为基元素时 , 它是类成员列表的一部分。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加到事件的事件处理程序附加到基础附加事件, 并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 触摸、鼠标和触笔输入在特定关系中存在。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的隧道事件为。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 标识 路由事件。

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 有关注册路由的事件的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event TextInput As TextCompositionEventHandler

summary.span: 在此元素以设备无关模式获取文本时发生。

span.span: Occurs when this element gets text in a device-independent manner.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此事件可能已标记为由复合控件的内部实现进行处理。This event might already be marked as handled by the internal implementations of composited controls. 请参阅下面的注释。See Remark below. 事件可能已标记为由复合控件的内部实现进行处理。The event may already be marked as handled by the internal implementations of composited controls. 例如, 是一个复合控件, 其中的事件已标记为已处理, 在其组合中。For example, a is a composited control where the event is already marked as handled; within its compositing. 控件这样做的原因是, 控件需要解释某些类型的输入 (如箭头键), 以便对该控件具有特殊意义。Controls do this because the control needs to interpret some types of input, such as arrow keys, as having special meaning to that control. 如果将用作文本输入处理程序的事件, 可能会获得更好的结果。 If you use as the event where you attach handlers for text input, you may receive better results. 此方法可避免控件组合已将此事件标记为已处理并防止处理程序通过事件路由接收事件的大多数情况。This technique circumvents most cases where control composition has already marked this event as handled and prevents your handler from receiving the event along the event route. 事件允许组件或应用程序以与设备无关的方式侦听文本输入。The event allows a component or application to listen for text input in a device-independent manner. 键盘是的主要方法, 但语音、手写和其他输入设备也可能会引发。 The keyboard is the primary means of , but speech, handwriting, and other input devices can also raise . 由于键组合 (在默认键盘或通过输入法编辑器) 中, 多个键事件可能只引发一个文本输入事件。Because of key combinations - either in default keyboards or through input method editors - multiple key events might raise just one text input event. 此事件将为此类创建附加事件的别名, 因此当继承为基元素时 , 它是类成员列表的一部分。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加到事件的事件处理程序附加到基础附加事件, 并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的隧道事件为。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.RoutedEvent TextInputEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly TextInputEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: 当悬停在此元素上方的手指触摸屏幕时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a finger touches the screen while the finger is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下, 在手指触摸屏幕并移动之前, 和事件不会发生。By default, the and events do not occur until a finger touches the screen and moves. 在屏幕上按一根手指并在不移动它的情况下, 将导致的按下和保持行为。Pressing a finger on the screen and holding it without moving it causes the press and hold behavior of a . 按住行为等效于鼠标右键单击。The press and hold behavior is equivalent to a mouse right-click. 若要使和事件在手指触摸屏幕时立即发生, 请将此元素的附加属性设置`false`为。To cause the and events to occur as soon as a finger touches the screen, set the attached property to `false` for this element. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|类型。 of type .| - 对应的隧道事件为。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 重写以在派生类中实现此事件的类处理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

Public Shared ReadOnly TouchDownEvent As RoutedEvent
